title: Alpha Client is cool?
body:
I was just wondering since I got into alpha, do I get any rewards/benifits for using the alpha client? Also is it worth downloading it and is it a seperate client to the normal/beta one?
Also what are your experiences using alpha client?

replies.body:
When did you get into the alpha? 

If you got into it [before it closed](http://oce.leagueoflegends%%%%/en/client-update/article/3a587e99-6c9b-437a-a03b-7a7ac2be4bf8) (12 days ago from now(22/11/2016)) you are eligible for a summoner icon, but only if you logged into the alpha/beta client before the 15th of November.

As for experiences, have a look through some of the posts, as they range from the beginning to very recently.

I enjoyed the alpha client personally. It was... rough at the start, but it was pretty awesome to watch the client grow and even help mould it into what it is today. 

Some might disagree (those that do are wrong {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} ), but I believe that the devs have outdone themselves with the new client and both they and Riot should be proud.

Hope this helps :)
